content:
Universal Containers has a customer base where many customers have the same or similar company names.
Which functionality should be configured to improve an end user's search experience? (Choose two.)
options: A. Update the account search layouts search filter fields.
B. Update the account search layouts search results columns displayed.
C. Update the account search layouts list view filter settings.
D. Update the account search layouts accounts tab columns displayed.
title: Question 1

content: What language is used to query Salesforce for specific information?
options: A. SOQL
B. SQL
C. SOSL
D. Apex
title: Question 2

content: Which of these is NOT an appropriate use case for Lightning Connect?
options: A. You only need real-time access to a small fraction of the external data.
B. You need to setup workflows and triggers for the external data.
C. You want to integrate external data without writing custom code.
D. The external data is changing frequently.
title: Question 3

content:
Universal Containers has limited in-house development resources, but would like to support online payment processing for its products.
What is the recommended solution to meet this requirement?
options: A. Configure Outbound Messaging to send a message to an external Payment Gateway.
B. Work with developers to develop custom code for payment processing.
C. Configure price books, products, and payment schedules to enable this capability.
D. Install an AppExchange product to provide Payment Gateway processing.
title: Question 4

content: Each workflow rule applies to a single object.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 5

content: What determines whether a user can create a new record using a specific record type?
options: A. Sharing
B. Page layout
C. Field level security
D. Profile
title: Question 6

content:
A sales manager would like to look at an Account record and view charts of all the related open opportunities, closed/won opportunities, and open cases.
How many report charts can be added to the Account page layout to meet this requirement?
title: Question 7

content:
Your manager has asked you to create an object with radio buttons that track a rating of 1-5.
How will you achieve this?
options: A. Create a dependent picklist that feeds the radio button type field.
B. Create a Visualforce page with radio buttons.
C. Create a formula field.
D. Create a radio button with 5 option.
title: Question 8

content:
ABC Company is using assignment rules to distribute cases to regional teams.
Which of the following is true?
options: A. Cases may be assigned to queues (if configured).
B. Cases may be assigned to public groups (if configured).
C. It is possible to have multiple active assignment rules.
D. A workflow field update can be used instead.
title: Question 9

content:
ABC Company want to store an area code and wants to be able to search for it in searches.
Which are possible fields to store the data? (Choose two.)
options: A. Text
B. Multi Picklist
C. Phone
D. Email
title: Question 10

content: What happens when you convert a picklist to a multi-select picklist? (Choose two.)
options: A. Values not in the picklist are deleted from existing records when the data type changes.
B. Values are retained.
C. You can't convert to a multi-select picklist.
D. Data is lost.
title: Question 11

content: What is the maximum number of master-detail lookup relationships allowable per object?
title: Question 12

content: Which three Salesforce functionalities are ignored when processing field updates in workflow rules and approval processes? (Choose three.)
options: A. Record type picklist value assignments
B. Decimal places and character limits
C. Validation rules
D. Field-level security
E. Multiple currencies
title: Question 13

content: Which of the following cannot be done via a Workflow?
options: A. Create an Outbound Message
B. Create an Event
C. Create a Task
D. Create an E-mail Alert
title: Question 14

content: Which of the following are types of developer sandboxes environment types in Salesforce? (Choose four.)
options: A. Full Sandbox
B. Partial Copy
C. Partial Sandbox
D. Developer
E. Developer Pro
F. Full Copy
title: Question 15

content:
The VP of Sales at Universal Containers wants to have a set of screens to guide the inside sales team through collecting and updating data for leads.
How can the app builder accomplish this?
options: A. Workflow
B. Flow
C. Process Builder
D. Lightning Connect
title: Question 16

content: Which of these is NOT true about external objects?
options: A. They integrate with Salesforce APIs, Apex, Visualforce, and Chatter.
B. They are automatically viewable in the Salesforce Mobile App.
C. You can use them in formula fields.
D. They can be related to other objects.
title: Question 17

content: Identify the field update limitations. (Choose three.)
options: A. In a batch update, workflow is re-triggered on all entities where there is a change.
B. Read-only fields like formula or auto-number fields aren't available for field updates.
C. Field updates that are executed as approval actions don't trigger workflow rules.
D. The results of a field update can't trigger additional rules such as validation, assignment, auto-response, or escalation rules.
title: Question 18

content: Which three are true about converting a tabular, summary, or matrix report to a joined report? (Choose three.)
options: A. The Rows to Display filter is not supported in joined reports.
B. Bucket fields are not supported in joined reports.
C. Cross filters are not supported in joined reports.
D. Joined report blocks are formatted as matrix reports.
E. Report formula fields are not supported in joined reports.
title: Question 19

content: How can you make a field mandatory? (Choose three.)
options: A. Create a Workflow Rule.
B. Check the required field box on the page layout.
C. Creating a validation rule for the field.
D. Check the required field box for the field on the record type.
E. Check the required field box on the field definition.
title: Question 20

content:
An app builder has been asked to provide users a way to identify a Contact's "Preferred Contact Method" directly on the Contact record. Users need to be able to identify whether a phone number or an e-mail is the Contact's preferred communication method.
What field type will allow the app builder to accomplish this with the fewest fields possible?
options: A. Checkboxes
B. Picklist
C. E-mail
D. Formula
title: Question 21

content: Which two are capabilities of Schema Builder? (Choose two.)
options: A. Editing custom settings.
B. Showing selected objects on a page.
C. Viewing page layouts in a new window.
D. Creating a new record type.
title: Question 22

content: What is true about validation rules? (Choose all that apply.)
options: A. When one validation rule fails, Salesforce continues to check any additional validation rules on that field or any other field on the page and displays all appropriate error messages at once.
B. Validation rules are only enforced during lead conversion if "validation and triggers for lead conversion" are enabled in your organization.
C. Campaign hierarchies follow validation rules.
D. Salesforce runs validation rules before creating records submitted via Web-to-Lead and Web-to-Case, and only creates records that have valid values.
title: Question 23

content: What is true about change sets? (Choose two.)
options: A. They contain data such as records.
B. Change sets can only contain modifications you can make through the Setup menu.
C. Change sets can only be sent between organizations that are affiliated with a production organization.
D. All of the above.
title: Question 24

content: When scheduling automatic data exporting with the Data Export Wizard, you must specify all of the following except __________.
options: A. Number of attachments
B. Time of day
C. Start and end dates
D. Frequency, if your organization supports monthly exports
title: Question 25

content:
At Universal Containers, the VP of Service has requested a visual indicator flag on each case, based on the case priority. High-priority case should be flagged red, medium-priority should be flagged yellow, and low-priority cases should be flagged green.
Which two formulas will accomplish this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. IMAGE( IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Low"), "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Medium"), "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High"), "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif) ) ), "Priority Flag")

B. IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Low"), "/img/samples/flag_green.gif , IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Medium"), "/img/ samples/flag_yellow.gif", IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, "High"), "/img/samples/flag_red.gif, "/s.gif") ) )
C. CASE( Priority, "Low", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Medium", "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "High", "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif")
D. IMAGE( CASE( Priority, "Low", "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Medium", "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif, "High", "img/samples/flag_red.gif", "/s.gif"), "Priority Flag")
title: Question 26

content:
Universal Containers requires e-mails to be sent to additional recipients when a workflow e-mail alert is triggered from the case object.
Which two field types need to be added to the case object to allow additional recipients on the e-mail alert? (Choose two.)
options: A. Lookup field
B. Text field
C. Formula field
D. E-mail field
title: Question 27

content: Which three options are available for assigning access to Lightning Pages using Lightning App Builder? (Choose three.)
options: A. The org default
B. App, record type, profile
C. App default
D. Profile and permission sets
E. Role and subordinates
title: Question 28

content: What type of relationships can you create on External Objects? (Choose all that apply.)
options: A. Direct lookup
B. All of the above
C. Indirect lookup
D. External lookup
E. Lookup
title: Question 29

content:
Users at Universal Containers need to be able to quickly create a Resource record from the Project record's Chatter feed.
How should the app builder define this functionality?
options: A. By creating a custom "Create a Record" Action on the Project.
B. By creating a custom "Detail Page" Button on the Project.
C. By creating a custom "Detail Page" Button on the Resource.
D. By creating a custom "Create a Record" Action on the Resource.
title: Question 30

content:
When an opportunity has a discount of more than 40%, notify the CEO via e-mail and request sign-off. Provide a way for the CEO to leave comments.
Which tool would you use for the following use case?
options: A. Approvals
B. Workflow
C. Flow
D. Process builder
title: Question 31

content:
A developer wants to make sure that all fields on his new custom object are editable to all profiles.
What should be checked on field level security?
options: A. Disable Visible but Enable Read-Only.
B. Enable Visible but Disable Read-Only.
C. Disable Visible and Read-Only.
D. Enable Visible and Read-Only.
title: Question 32

content: What feature can an app builder use to automatically assign cases that have been open longer than three days to the next support tier?
options: A. Case Business Rules
B. Case Assignment Rules
C. Case Auto Response Rules
D. Case Escalation Rules
title: Question 33

content:
You have a team of developers who need logins to sandbox.
What's the best way to give them access?
options: A. Have them login as one of the users in production.
B. Use Developer Edition to log into sandbox.
C. Create them as inactive users in production.
D. Create them as users in sandbox, then deactivate the same number of users in production.
title: Question 34

content:
An app builder would like to streamline the user experience by reflecting summarized calculations of specific fields on various objects.
Which three field types could be used in roll-up summary fields to accomplish this? (Choose three.)
options: A. Checkbox
B. Time
C. Percent
D. Date
E. Currency
title: Question 35

content: When using the Data Export Wizard to manually export data, you can only export data if __________.
options: A. Your data doesn't include attachments, images, or documents.
B. Enough time has passed since your last export.
C. You've installed a client application to export the data.
D. You are an Admin.
title: Question 36

content: In which of these scenarios is ETL a better choice than Lightning Connect?
options: A. You need to create or update the external data in addition to reading it.
B. All of the above.
C. You want to generate reports and charts from the external data.
D. You need the external data to follow the sharing rules defined for your organization.
title: Question 37

content:
An app builder has been asked to integrate Salesforce with an external web service. The web service must be notified every time an Opportunity is Won.
Which two can satisfy this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Use a workflow rule and an outbound message.
B. Use a process and Apex code.
C. Use a process and an outbound message.
D. Write a trigger to use Apex Managed Sharing to grant access with the Process Improvement team.
title: Question 38

content: Ideally, who should be in charge of logging all changes in production?
options: A. Administrator
B. Developer
C. QA Engineer
D. Product Manager
title: Question 39

content: What is true about Junction objects?
options: A. Junction object records are deleted when either associated master record is deleted and placed in the Recycle Bin.
B. The first master-detail relationship you create on your junction object becomes the primary relationship.
C. All of the above.
D. If both associated master records are deleted, the junction object record is deleted permanently and can't be restored.
title: Question 40

content: Which statement about record types is true? (Choose two.)
options: A. Record types can only be assigned to one profile at a time.
B. The ability to create records of a specific record type is determined by the profile.
C. Record types can be used to define picklist values available for a given field.
D. Users cannot view records assigned to a record type their profile does not have access to.
title: Question 41

content: Recursive triggers may cause your organization to exceed its limit for workflow time triggers per hour.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 42

content: Which API cannot be used to create the data model? (Choose three.)
options: A. AJAX toolkit for Force.com
B. Force.com API
C. Force.com Metadata API
D. Force.com Single Sign-on API
title: Question 43

content: You should use a lookup filter if __________. (Choose two.)
options: A. You are close to the maximum number of lookup filters allowed.
B. You want to improve user efficiency by automating filters on lookup search dialogs that your users manually set.

C. You must implement a complex business rule that requires you to use a formula. Formulas can reference fields that basic filter criteria can't reference, such as fields on the parent of the source object. Formulas can also use functions. For example, use ISNEW if the rule should only apply on record creation, or ISCHANGED if the rule should apply when a field changes.
D. You want to improve user efficiency by limiting the number of available options in a lookup search dialog.
title: Question 44

content: Which of the following is true about Roll-up Summary Fields?
options: A. Roll-up Summary can only be set on the parent of a Master-Detail or Lookup relationship.
B. Roll-up Summary Fields are readonly.
C. The results of the Roll-up Summary is displayed on the child in a master-detail relationship.
D. Roll-up Summary can be used to compute SUM, MIN, MAX, AVG over a set of records.
title: Question 45

content:
An admin is trying to add a custom VF page to the mobile app quick navigation menu but can't.
What might be the problem?
options: A. Menu hasn't been configured for VF page.
B. VF page doesn't have a tab.
C. VF page has fields that profile can't access.
title: Question 46

content:
In a data model object, A is related to B, B is related to C.
How will a developer create a report to include fields of A & C?
options: A. Create a custom report with A and C fields as the relationship already exists.
B. Report cannot be created.
C. Create a custom report type with A, B and C, and use it in the report.
D. Create lookup relationships between A, B and C.
title: Question 47

content:
A new custom object is begin created with a private sharing setting. The business wants to share individual records with specific people or groups of people on a case-by-case basis.
Which three options does the business user have to manually share individual records? (Choose three.)
options: A. Roles
B. Users
C. Public Groups
D. Profiles
E. Permission Sets
title: Question 48

content: When changing a fields data type, which scenario can you expect data loss? (Choose two.)
options: A. Email to Text
B. Number to Text
C. Currency to Number
D. Text to Picklist
title: Question 49

content: What is not a capability of the lead object? (Choose two.)
options: A. Leads can be grouped into queues.
B. Custom objects that have been related to a lead can be copied when a lead is converted to the account, contact or opportunity.
C. Leads can be automatically assigned to users or queues.
D. Standard or Custom fields can be mapped to fields in the Account, Contact and Opportunity objects as part of lead conversion.
title: Question 50

content:
An app builder is loading data into Salesforce. To link new records back to the legacy system, a field will be used to track the legacy ID on the Account object. For future data loads this ID will be used when upserting records.
Which two fields attributes should be selected? (Choose two.)
options: A. Text (encrypted)
B. Unique
C. External ID
D. Required
title: Question 51

content: What is true for all custom and some standard objects?
options: A. Cross-object field updates work for a few standard-to-standard master-detail relationships.
B. You can create workflow and approval actions where a change to a detail record updates a field on the related master record.
C. Cross-object field updates work for custom-to-custom master-detail relationships, custom-to-standard master-detail relationships.
D. All of the above.
title: Question 52

content: If a field update for Rule1 triggers Rule2, and a field update for Rule2 triggers Rule1 ___________.
options: A. When the second trigger is saved an Imminent Loop Error message will be displayed and the workflow rule update will not save.
B. The updates create a loop and the org limits for workflow time triggers per hour will likely be violated.
C. The updates create a loop and the org be blocked until the admin resolves the issue.
D. Loop is allowed to run 25 times within one hour. If it does not end on its own the process will be stopped by R&D.
title: Question 53

content: Which two statements are true about field update actions from workflow rules and approval processes? (Choose two.)
options: A. Field updates to records based on workflow rules and approval processes do not trigger Validation Rules.
B. Field updates are tracked in the History related list of a record regardless of whether or not history tracking is set for those fields.
C. Field updates are not available on currency fields if the organization uses multi-currency.
D. Field updates with "Re-evaluate Workflow Rules" selected can cause a recursive loop if the update field is included in a workflow.
title: Question 54

content: Use Data Loader when __________. (Choose three.)
options: A. You want to schedule regular data loads, such as nightly imports.
B. You don't need the import process to be automated.

C. You need to load 50,000 to five million records. If you need to load more than 5 million records, we recommend you work with a Salesforce partner or visit the AppExchange for a suitable partner product.
D. You need to load into an object that is not supported by the Data Import Wizard.
title: Question 55

content: Which Salesforce Formula Function can return a value based on more than two different field parameters?
options: A. Case Statement
B. Contains
C. IF Statement
D. Beings
title: Question 56

content: All of the following are advantages of the Schema Builder except __________.
options: A. All object and field relationship details are available from one screen.
B. It's easy to build objects and fields directly from the Schema Builder, allowing you to visualize and change relationships with ease.
C. You can view fields and relationships for custom, but not standard objects.
D. Schema Builder shows details like field values, required fields, and how objects are related.
title: Question 57

content:
DRAG DROP
In what order does Salesforce process rules? Match the rules from the left column with their appropriate order in the right column.
title: Question 58

content: A field designated as required, is only required when it is added to a user's page layout.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 59

content: Which Action Type is not available when working with Global Actions?
options: A. Log a Call
B. Update a Record
C. Create a Record
D. Custom Visualforce
title: Question 60

content: What is true about Case Assignment rules? (Choose three.)
options: A. Create a complex business logic assignment rules.
B. They allow cases to be assigned to queues.
C. They allow more than one rule entry per rule.
D. They allow more than one active assignment rule.
E. Predefined Case Team is mandatory for each entry rule.
title: Question 61

content: Person Accounts ___________. (Choose two.)
options: A. Have the same icon as Business accounts.
B. Are enabled by default.
C. Can only be merged with other person accounts.
D. Are enabled via feature license.
E. Do use space in both account and contacts table.
title: Question 62

content:
Universal Containers would like to optimize routes for its traveling service personnel.
What is the recommended solution to meet this requirement?
options: A. Use geolocation fields with the DISTANCE and GEOLOCATION formulas.
B. Configure routing options in a custom object.
C. Use an AppExchange partner product.
D. Configure Territory Hierarchy and rules for route based on Territory.
title: Question 63

content:
An organization wants to create a field to store manager data on the user object. The manager field is a reference to another user record.
What type of relationship should be used?
options: A. Lookup
B. Hierarchical
C. Master-Detail
D. Many-to-many
title: Question 64

content: In terms of the order of execution, what must be taken into account when using Validation rules & Workflows?
options: A. Validation rules fire before Workflow rules therefore will not catch any data that does not abide by your Validation rules.
B. Validation rules & Workflow rules fire on separate automation schedules and therefore the order of execution can be ignored.
C. Validation rules fire after Workflow rules, so you must ensure that Workflow rules abide by your Validation rules to avoid errors.
D. The order of execution can be controlled in Salesforce setup.
title: Question 65

content:
Universal Containers wants to test code against a subset of production data that is under 5 GB. Additionally, Universal Containers would like to refresh this sandbox every weekend.
What type of sandbox should be used to accomplish this?
options: A. Developer Pro
B. Full
C. Developer
D. Partial Copy
title: Question 66

content: Which of the following descriptions about the Lightning Components framework is true?
options: A. It uses a stateful client and stateless server architecture.
B. All of the above.
C. It uses JavaScript on the client side and Apex on the server side.
D. It uses events to communicate data between components.
title: Question 67

content:
For an external object relationship, you can create an external lookup relationship.
What type of object(s) can be the parent?
options: A. Standard or Custom
B. Custom
C. External
D. Standard or External
title: Question 68

content: What is true about a master detail relationship? (Choose three.)
options: A. You can create a master-detail relationship if the custom object already contains data.
B. You can create a relationship as a lookup and then convert it to master-detail if the lookup field in all records contains a value.
C. By default, records can be reparented master-detail relationships.
D. Standard objects can't be on the detail side of a custom object in a master-detail relationship.
E. To create multilevel master-detail relationships, you need the "Customize Application" user permission.
title: Question 69

content:
An app builder wants to show Groups as the last navigation menu item in the Salesforce Mobile App.
However, the app builder is not able to select Groups as one of the items on the drop-down menu.
What could cause this?
options: A. Groups is included in the Smart Search items but not on the navigation menu.
B. Groups is not included in the selected list for the navigation menu.
C. Groups cannot be the last item in the navigation menu.
D. Groups is showing up in the recent section and not in the navigation menu.
title: Question 70

content: Which capability allows an app builder to grant object-level access? (Choose two.)
options: A. Assigning a user a Permission Set that allows Read and Edit access to an object.
B. Assigning a user a Profile that allows Read access to an object.
C. Assigning a user a Role that allows Read access to an object.
D. Assigning a user a Public Group that allows for Read and Edit access to an object.
title: Question 71

content: Which three statements are true about Master-Detail relationships? (Choose three.)
options: A. A Master-Detail relationship cannot be created if the custom object on the detail side already contains data.
B. Standard objects can be on the detail side of a custom object in a Master-Detail relationship.
C. Master-Detail relationships cannot be converted to a look-up relationship.
D. Deleting a master record in a Master-Detail relationship deletes all related detail records.
E. Master-Detail relationships can convert to a lookup relationship if no roll-up summary fields exist on the master object.
title: Question 72

content: What layer of model-view-controller paradigm are standard or custom objects associated with?
options: A. View and Controller
B. View
C. Controller
D. Model
title: Question 73

content:
The app builder at Universal Containers has been asked to ensure that when an Opportunity record exceeding $20k is being saved, details have been captured in the Comments field.
What can be used to meet this requirement?
options: A. Workflow
B. Approval Process
C. Process Builder
D. Validation Rule
title: Question 74

content:
An app builder has been asked to integrate Salesforce with an external web service. The web service must be notified every time an opportunity is won.
What are two ways to satisfy this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Use flow with outbound message.
B. Use a process and an outbound message.
C. Use workflow with an outbound message.
D. Use a process and apex code.
title: Question 75

content: What is true about Workflow rules? (Choose all that apply.)
options: A. Saving or creating records can trigger more than one rule.
B. Workflow rules only trigger on converted leads if validation and triggers for lead convert are enabled in your organization.
C. Workflow rules can't be triggered by campaign statistic fields, including individual campaign statistics and campaign hierarchy statistics.
D. Workflow rules trigger automatically and are visible to the user.
title: Question 76

content:
When an opportunity close date is delayed by more than 60 days, the manager and the VP of Sales must approve the change.
Which two solutions will meet the requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Create a workflow rule that checks for close date less than 60 days and add an e-mail alert.
B. Create a Process Builder flow that submits the record for an approval process.
C. Build a validation rule that does not allow a user to save the opportunity record.
D. Build an approval process that requires unanimous approval from the manager and VP of Sales.
title: Question 77

content: You can export data from Salesforce using any of the following methods except __________.
options: A. Use the data Export wizard within SF to export data manually or automatically.
B. Log a case with SF.
C. Use the data Manager tool to manually request an export of all the data in your organization.
D. Use the data loader client application.
title: Question 78

content: SF can connect social profiles to all of the following objects except __________.
options: A. Person Accounts
B. Business Accounts
C. Users
D. Contacts
E. Leads
title: Question 79

content:
Universal Containers has a requirement that an Opportunity should have a field showing the value of its associated account's billing state. This value should not change after the Opportunity has been created.
What is the recommended solution to configure this automation behavior?
options: A. Workflow
B. Apex
C. Roll-up summary field
D. Formula field
title: Question 80

content:
The marketing team at Universal Containers has a list of 400 leads they would like to upload to Salesforce. They need to avoid creating duplicate records.
Which two actions should be taken to meet this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Upload the lead list using the Import Wizard and select a Matching Type to prevent duplicate lead creation.
B. Use Data Loader's update function to import leads and match to existing records based on e-mail address.
C. Enable Duplicate Matching in the Data Management section in Setup and activate the Lead-to-Lead scenario.
D. Utilize a Lead Matching Rule and corresponding Duplicate Rule to block newly created duplicate leads.
title: Question 81

content: Which three statements are true about converting a Lead? (Choose three.)
options: A. Users can convert leads that are associated with an active approval process.
B. The system automatically maps standard lead fields to standard account, contact, and opportunity fields.
C. The Lead's most recent campaign record is automatically applied to the "Primary Campaign Source" field on the opportunity.
D. Multi-select picklist values on Lead records overwrite values on Contact's corresponding field.
E. Administrators may choose whether to enforce validation rules and triggers.
title: Question 82

content:
Use case: An object called "House" is related to Opportunity, there can be many Houses per Opportunity. On houses, we have a field named "Square feet". We need to show the total of Square feet for all houses on each Opportunity.
What type of relationship should we have?
options: A. Cross-Object
B. Master-Detail
C. Junction
D. Lookup
title: Question 83

content: You can have multiple records with the same external ID.
options: A. True
B. False
title: Question 84

content: When would a developer use upsert and external IDs? (Choose two.)
options: A. To migrate customizations from a sandbox to production.
B. To use Web Services API to query for data.
C. To integrate with an external system.
D. To load related records without knowing Salesforce record IDs.
title: Question 85

content: What is the maximum number of external IDs an object may have?
title: Question 86

content:
A junction object has two Master-Detail relationships, a primary and a secondary master object.
What happens to a junction object record when both associated master records are deleted?
options: A. The junction object record is permanently deleted and can't be restored.
B. The junction object records is deleted and placed in the recycle bin.
C. The delete operation is not allowed with Roll-up summary fields defined.
D. The delete operation cannot be performed on both master records.
title: Question 87

content:
Universal Containers would like to show different values to different groups of users in a custom picklist field.
What should be configured?
options: A. Record Types
B. Page layouts
C. Field-level security
D. Permission sets
title: Question 88

content: Standard picklist fields can be controlling or dependent.
options: A. True
B. False
title: Question 89

content: What are the steps for creating a dynamic approval process?
options: A. Create an approval process.
B. All of the above.
C. Create standard object as an approval matrix.

D. Create (user) lookup fields on the object being approved, Create a custom object as an approval matrix, Populate the approval matrix record, Create Apex code to populate the user fields from the approval matrix record, Create or update an approval process to utilize the new lookup fields.
title: Question 90

content: A lightning Page is __________.
options: A. The new name for a SF page layout.
B. A page you can access via a customer community.
C. A compact, configurable, and reusable element.
D. A custom layout for creating pages in Salesforce.
title: Question 91

content: You can control access to report folders based on __________.
options: A. Permissions, roles, and public groups.
B. Password settings, permissions, and user settings.
C. Public groups, organization-wide defaults, and IP restrictions.
D. All of the above.
title: Question 92

content: What is a true statement when deleting a dashboard?
options: A. Deleting a dashboard also deletes the components within it. It does not delete the custom reports used by the components.
B. Deleting a dashboard requires a user to first edit the components to remove the underlying reports.
C. Deleting a dashboard also deletes the components within it as well as the custom reports used by the components.
D. Deleting a dashboard does not move the dashboard to the Recycle Bin and therefore the dashboard cannot be recovered.
title: Question 93

content:
You have a requirement to ensure that if the discount field on an opp is greater than 30%, the record should be automatically submitted for Approval.
Which of the following would help you meet this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Process Builder
B. Visual Workflow
C. Workflow
D. Approval Process
title: Question 94

content:
Universal Containers has two types of customer support processes: Platinum and Diamond. The app builder created separate record types for each process on the Case object. The customer support team should not be able to create new cases with the Diamond record type.
How can this requirement be met?
options: A. Make the record type hidden to all users and then use sharing rules to share it.
B. Update the profile to remove the Diamond record type from the support team.
C. Remove the ability for the support team to create new case records.
D. Update the organization-wide defaults to private.
title: Question 95

content: What sandbox type allows for the use of a sandbox template?
options: A. Developer Sandbox
B. Developer Pro Sandbox
C. Partial Sandbox
D. Config Sandbox
title: Question 96

content:
Field type conversion.
Which of the following are true? (Choose two.)
options: A. Data can be lost when converting from auto-number to text.
B. Data can be lost when converting from simple picklist to multi picklist.
C. Information can be lost when converting from text area (rich) to text area (long).
D. Data can be lost converting from number to currency (assuming that field lengths are identical).
title: Question 97

content: What is not a possible action of the Lightning Process Builder?
options: A. Trigger a Flow
B. Trigger APEX
C. Send an Outbound message
D. Update a record
title: Question 98

content: When do you need to refresh a sandbox? (Choose two.)
options: A. Anytime.
B. 3 Hours before you need it.
C. When modification have been made to the production organization.
D. When you are done making changes to it.
title: Question 99

content: You have created a workflow rule to send an e-mail in your configuration sandbox. For some reason it's not working, what should you double check? (Choose two.)
options: A. Check the deliverability settings.
B. Look at the system audit trail.
C. HTML does not work in sandbox, make sure your e-mail has no HTML.
D. You have the correct e-mail address.
title: Question 100

content: What are the three different custom tabs you can create? (Choose three.)
options: A. Visualforce Tab
B. Standard Object Tab
C. Web Tab
D. Custom Object Tab
E. APEX Tab
title: Question 101

content:
Sales representatives want to capture custom Feedback record details related to each Account. The sales reps want to accomplish this with minimal clicks on the Salesforce Mobile Application.
Which two solutions should be recommended in order to meet this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Create predefined values for most of the fields.
B. Create a feedback object as a parent of Account.
C. Create an object-specific action on Account.
D. Create a global action on Account.
title: Question 102

content:
Universal Containers needs to update a field on an Account when an Opportunity Stage is changed to Closed Lost.
Which two should be used to accomplish this requirement? (Choose two.)
options: A. Assignment Rule
B. Workflow Rule
C. Approval Process
D. Process Builder
title: Question 103

content:
Universal Containers wants their Field Sales team to only see the accounts that they own. Separate North American and European marketing teams should only see accounts in their respective regions. The Inside Sales Team needs to see all accounts in Salesforce.
How can this be accomplished?
options: A. Set the Organization-Wide Default to Public for accounts. Create profiles for each Marketing Team, and create an Inside Sales Team role that is at the top of the Role Hierarchy.

B. Set the Organization-Wide Default to Public for accounts. Create criteria-based sharing rules for each Marketing Team, and create an Inside Sales Team permission set with the "View All" setting for accounts.

C. Set the Organization-Wide Default to Private for accounts. Create criteria-based sharing rules for each Marketing Team, and create an Inside Sales Team profile with the "View All" setting for accounts.
D. Set the Organization-Wide Default to Private for accounts. Create permission sets for each Marketing Team, and create an Inside Sales Team profile with the "View All" setting for accounts.
title: Question 104

content:
Universal Containers sales reps can modify fields on an Opportunity until it is closed. Only the Sales Operations team can modify the Post-Close Follow-up Date and Post-Close Follow-up Comments fields.
How can these requirements be met?
options: A. Use multiple record types, page layouts, and profiles.
B. Use record types with field sets and restrict editing fields using field-level security.
C. Use field-level security on page layouts to restrict editing fields.
D. Use field-level security to mark fields as read-only on the Sales profile.
title: Question 105

content:
Universal Containers would like to embed a chart of all related Opportunities, by stage, on the Account detail page.
What type of report should an app builder create to add to the Account page layout?
options: A. A tabular report on the Account object.
B. A summary report on the Account object.
C. A summary report on the Opportunity object.
D. A tabular report on the Opportunity object.
title: Question 106

content: What should be done to create a custom object from the Schema Builder?
options: A. From the Elements tab, drag Object onto the canvas.
B. From the Objects tab, select New>Object.
C. Right-click in the canvas and select "New Object".
title: Question 107

content:
You need to provide a way to invoke a custom report from the account detail page. The report should render values that are specific to the account in context.
What are the best options? (Choose two.)
options: A. List Button
B. Detail Page Links
C. Detail Page Button
D. Visualforce
title: Question 108

content:
Representatives at Universal Containers uses Salesforce to record information for new Leads. When new prospects are added, an outbound message is sent to SAP with the Lead's information.
What automation process will accomplish this without writing any code?
options: A. Create a process using Process Builder to send the outbound message.
B. Use Flow to create a wizard that will send an outbound message.
C. Design an Approval Process that sends an outbound message upon approval.
D. Create a Workflow Rule with an outbound message as the action.
title: Question 109

content:
Universal Containers has purchased a Lightning Component on the AppExchange.
In which two areas can these Components be utilized? (Choose two.)
options: A. Flow Builder
B. Salesforce Mobile App
C. Process Builder
D. Standalone Lightning App
title: Question 110

content: Which two of the following are supported actions for the Global Actions Menu? (Choose two.)
options: A. Launch a custom Canvas App
B. Launch a custom Lighting Component
C. Post to a Chatter feed
D. Upload a new Chatter File
title: Question 111

content:
ABC Company wants to rollout new product bundles with several pricing options. Pricing options include product-price bundles, account specific pricing and more.
Which product satisfies the needs?
options: A. Lightning process builder.
B. Workflow on Opportunity/Opportunity Product.
C. Custom AppExchange app for product-pricing.
D. Formula fields on Opportunity/Opportunity Product.
title: Question 112
